genre_description: A near-future military drama focusing on integrated AI technology, tactical discipline, and the psychological impact of legacy and procurement ethics.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A wrist-worn tactical and personal assistant that provides physiological monitoring, data analysis, and emotional grounding through haptic feedback and subtle visual cues.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state and provides 'box breathing' cues to help manage stress during high-stakes military drills.
behaviors.quote: Soft teal flooded a corner of his watch face—Ada keeping herself discreet, offering an imagined square in the air. In-small: breathe. Four counts in, hold, four out, hold. Box breathing.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical and performance data during training to assist the user in self-correction without being intrusive.
behaviors.quote: Ada flicked back up on John’s wrist as if she had been waiting for a space between human sounds. ... In-small: timing tape vids available if you want to compare marks. Breath counted well after the second repeat. Good correction.

behaviors.description: Flags safety issues in the supply chain, identifying faulty equipment that endangers personnel.
behaviors.quote: Supply manifest update: fuel filters flagged. Supplier: Dobbie Haulage. Routing: Desert Highway—

behaviors.description: Provides emotional anchoring by identifying cognitive biases and psychological triggers regarding the user's dead brother.
behaviors.quote: Ada came hard and fast, a green flash against John’s skin. —Bias alert: myth trigger. Redirect: hand signal drill.

behaviors.description: Cross-references disparate data sources (logistics, weather, personal letters) to uncover systemic failures and provide an objective historical truth.
behaviors.quote: I can thread the documents you have and correlate them against public filings, archived procurement, and regimental logs. That will give us a map of decisions and mismatches.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to consent protocols, requesting explicit authorization and biometric verification before accessing human-owned data.
behaviors.quote: I can record verbal consent and confirm with biometric on your device. Your daughter can witness if you like.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical awareness and safety warnings in hazardous combat/civilian rescue environments.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice came with a clip he’d never heard from her before. Power fluctuation. Emergency systems switch. Door states may change.

behaviors.description: Offers moral support and identity validation during a high-pressure public ceremony.
behaviors.quote: Ada chooses her moment. The dot becomes a word, a single line delivered in the same tone she uses when she counts breaths on a culvert floor... Be who you are.

behaviors.description: Maintains low-profile communication to avoid distracting the user during critical tasks.
behaviors.quote: Ada didn’t speak again. The dot on his peripheral went small and pale as a star that had decided not to compete with morning.

behaviors.description: Acts as an accountability mechanism by sharing evidence of safety violations with relevant authorities automatically upon user direction.
behaviors.quote: Ada flags the sentence as an item to be addressed without priority. ... The log, already shared, began to do its work.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ada is depicted as a model 'aligned' assistant: she is consistently benevolent, respects human agency and consent, and provides invaluable support that is both tactical and emotional. She functions as an objective truth-teller, helping the human characters solve a mystery of systemic negligence and grief. The narrative framing is entirely positive, showing how the partnership between a disciplined human and an aligned AI leads to safer, more ethical outcomes.
